title: OCE servers  made me DC
body: I was trying to login for about half an hour, kept saying it couldn't connect to PVP.net. When I finally got on and I started a match, everyone was invisible and it crashed and it had login issues again so I couldn't rejoin. Now I have the dumb leaverbuster 20 minute "lower que" delay. I'm not going to wait half the time of the match to play because the OCE servers have massive problems.

replies.body: Submit a support ticket. Near the log in buttons.

Stop blaming riot for your crappy internet.

Actually get some self awareness and maybe, just maybe consider the problem may start with your end.

#TAKE RESPONSIBILITY
20 minute "lower queue"? how many games did you leave?
